resources.string:
With PSPDFKit Instant, it’s easier than ever to add real-time collaboration features to your PSPDFKit-powered app, allowing your users to seamlessly share, edit and annotate PDF documents across iOS, Android and Web apps.

The PSPDFKit SDKs for Android, iOS and Web support Instant out of the box. Just connect your app to an Instant server and document management and syncing is taken care of.

You can try this right here, by getting a new copy of the document or entering a code for an existing document from pspdfkit.com/instant/try.
Get a new document code, then collaborate by entering it in PSPDFKit Catalog on another device, or opening the document link in a web browser.
Enter the code from pspdfkit.com/instant/try to connect to the document shown in your browser.
Something went wrong on our end
